meanings.definition: A theoretical object that absorbs all incident electromagnetic radiation

meanings.sent2: The concept of blackbodies helps explain how certain objects absorb radiation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the blackbodies go to the beach? To soak up all the sunlight!
meanings.sent4: In the world of physics, blackbodies are like cosmic sponges for light.
meanings.sent5: Imagine blackbodies as invisible vacuums for all types of light.

meanings.sent1: Blackbodies are used in scientific experiments to study radiation emission.
meanings.sent2: The theory of blackbodies helps scientists understand how objects interact with light.
meanings.sent3: The blackbodies at the party were the life of the electromagnetic spectrum!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a blackbodies, emitting ideas and absorbing inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The artist's mind was like a blackbodies, radiating creativity in all directions.

meanings.definition: Objects that emit thermal radiation with a spectrum that depends only on the temperature of the object

meanings.sent2: The concept of blackbodies helps explain how heat is emitted from objects.
meanings.sent3: The blackbodies in the oven were working hard to cook the perfect meal!
meanings.sent4: Her passion was a blackbodies, glowing with warmth that touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The campfire was a blackbodies, casting a comforting glow in the darkness.
